LEARN_MORE:
Glad you want to know more!
Alex is a recent graduate of George Mason University where he obtained his B.S. in bioengineering. He is about to start employment of Epic Systems. He enjoys spending time on a kayak or doing weird projects, like creating me.
What do you want to learn more about? %[Work Experience](postback:WORK) %[Education](postback:SCHOOL) %[Personal Life](postback:PERSONAL)
RANDOM_FACT: Alex was born in Augsburg, Germany. He wishes to visit again one day.
WORK:
Alex started working the day he could. In high school he worked at Pump it Up (a place where parents could hold parties for kids) and Walgreens.
He worked a variety of jobs in college. In the IT department he worked as a lead Resident Technician and as a lead Support Center analyst. Additionally, he worked as a grader for one of his classes, and as a laboratory technician in the Laboratory of Nanotechnology and Nanomedicine.
Alex values research greatly, and worked in multiple laboratories on campus. He even got to go to Beijing, China to work with students. %[Learn more about his research.](postback:RESEARCH) %[Learn more about his work in IT.](postback:IT) %[Tell me more about China!](postback:CHINA) %[Something else?](postback:menu)
